com.wit.android.widget.adapter

Class SimpleCursorAdapter<C extends Cursor>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • com.wit.android.widget.adapter.BaseWidgetAdapter
        • com.wit.android.widget.adapter.BaseAdapter
          • com.wit.android.widget.adapter.SimpleCursorAdapter<C>
  • Type Parameters:
    C - Type of the cursor from which will this adapter bind the views.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    AdapterOptimizer.OptimizedAdapter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleCursorMultiAdapter

    public abstract class SimpleCursorAdapter<C extends Cursor>
extends BaseAdapter

      • onBindItemView

        public void onBindItemView(int position,
                  java.lang.Object viewHolder)
        Description copied from interface: AdapterOptimizer.OptimizedAdapter

        Invoked to bind item view with data. This is invoked whether the getView() method on the adapter is called.

        Parameters:
        position - Position of view in the adapter view.
        viewHolder - View holder of the actual item view on the given position. This is also holder which was set to the view by onCreateItemViewHolder() method while was view created.

      • reloadCursor

        protected final boolean reloadCursor(C cursor)

        Reloads the current cursor with the given one.

        Parameters:
        cursor - Must be valid cursor.
        Returns:
        True if cursor was successfully reloaded, false otherwise.

      • moveCursorTo

        protected boolean moveCursorTo(int position)

        Moves the current cursor to the requested position.

        Parameters:
        position - Position to move cursor to.
        Returns:
        True if cursor was moved to requested position, false otherwise.
